channel.title: Deleting the Ancient Magic Tab Left Of The Friends List Tab. -Project Czar
channel.description:
I've edited this source so much it barely looks like Czar anymore. But the thing is, I can't get the stupid Ancient Tab to delete that's left of the Friends List Smiley (The tab with nothing on it) I've search setSidebarInterface and all that bull and I can't find it in there. I've found two that I know of and that's one for the Ancient altar and the other for the Npc Dark Mage(His doesn't work.)
How do I remove the Ancient Magics on the blank tab next to the friends list? e.i. I click on the tab left of the friends list happy face and it shows the ancients, how do I remove that so I can add in the ancient altar and stuff so people have to pray there to get ancient magic?
I know I search setSidebarInterface and I have but there's only npcDialogue that changes my regular magic to ancients and that's the dark mage and talking to him only brings up a shop, so it doesn't work, then I found one that does it for the ancient altar. It works, but I don't want the Ancient Spells on that empty tab left of the friends list tab.

item.title: Deleting the Ancient Magic Tab Left Of The Friends List Tab. -Project Czar
item.dc:creator: @Scarr Scarr
item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

 I've edited this source so much it barely looks like Czar anymore. But the thing is, I can't get the stupid Ancient Tab to delete that's left of the Friends List Smiley (The tab with nothing on it) I've search setSidebarInterface and all that bull and I can't find it in there. I've found two that I know of and that's one for the Ancient altar and the other for the Npc Dark Mage(His doesn't work.)

 How do I remove the Ancient Magics on the blank tab next to the friends list? e.i. I click on the tab left of the friends list happy face and it shows the ancients, how do I remove that so I can add in the ancient altar and stuff so people have to pray there to get ancient magic?

 I know I search setSidebarInterface and I have but there's only npcDialogue that changes my regular magic to ancients and that's the dark mage and talking to him only brings up a shop, so it doesn't work, then I found one that does it for the ancient altar. It works, but I don't want the Ancient Spells on that empty tab left of the friends list tab.
